title: Awesome House for Sale in Pelawatta
details: Tastefully designed 3 year old house in a highly residential area off Kumaragewatte. 3 Bedrooms, 3 washrooms, 1 office room, pantry, Domestic's toilet, Plunge pool and parking for 1 vehicle. Ample parking on the 30 foot private road. Hot water, AC in 1 bedroom and provision for AC in the other rooms. Rs 36.5 Million. Contact Agent - 0777325106
